alert.note: Alert for Upper Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 05 at 2:02PM MDT until November 06 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Upper Yampa River Basin. * WHEN...From 6 PM MDT this evening to 11 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
